vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ki.20.12;
son of: Baladan (H1081)
Also named: me.ro.dakh bal.a.dan (מְרֹדַךְ בַּלְאֲדָן "Merodach-baladan" H4757)
§ Berodach-baladan = "worshipper of Baal"
king of Babylon in the days of Hezekiah
